author: bencomic
title: TIME BANDITS PART 12: What's that oil on my balls?

left.text: what's dat oil on muh bizzawz, in the hood

right.text: what's dat oil on muh bizzawz, with muh beeotch

left.text: what's dat oil on muh bizzawz, son pleeze!

right.text: what's dat oil on muh bizzawz, otay buh-weet

left.text: what's dat oil on muh bizzawz, and git Sheniquah's ass back ova' heeah.

right.text: what's dat oil on muh bizzawz. Ya' dig?
